<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 23"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Ghosthand's Comet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2363)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 179 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The barrel of this long rifle is translucent in places, forming a swirled pattern along the metal, and its stock is formed of crimson wood. _Ghosthand's Comet_ is a _+4 [major striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [beast-bane](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1041) [greater impactful](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1062) advanced firearm_ with a [range increment](/Traits.aspx?ID=248) of 300 feet. It deals 5d8 force damage and has the [backstabber](/Traits.aspx?ID=172), [concussive](/Traits.aspx?ID=401), [kickback](/Traits.aspx?ID=409), and [fatal d12 traits](/Traits.aspx?ID=178). As a star gun, _Ghosthand's Comet_ runs on magic and doesn't use ammunition or black powder. The weapon is silent when fired.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))  **Trigger** You attempt a ranged Strike with _Ghosthand's Comet_;  **Effect** For the triggering Strike, _Ghosthand's Comet_ changes its damage type to your choice of acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))    **Effect** On your next attempt at a ranged Strike with _Ghosthand's Comet_, the shot phases through any material or magical obstacle, such as a [_wall of force_](/Spells.aspx?ID=363), in its path, ignoring all [cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=459). You must attempt the Strike by the end of your turn or this effect is lost.

**Destruction** If the [Grim Reaper](/Monsters.aspx?ID=250) slays the wielder of _Ghosthand's Comet_, the Reaper's scythe, as it strikes the killing blow, is destined to slice the star gun in half.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Ghosthand's Comet
